name: Hentai Chicks
detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME
Hentai Chicks is a casual puzzle game in which you only need to replace the fragments of the picture, gradually collecting the full picture. The game allows you to cheat, you can unlock all the pictures in just one minute and view the images with one hand.
When you have completed the puzzle, you can view the finished images in the gallery at any time.
There is no time to solve puzzles or other limitations in the game, the goal is to allow you to relax.

FEATURES
▪ 10 images
▪ Cheating mode (F) and violation of the order of image fragments (R)
▪ Your progress is saved in the gallery.
▪ Gallery can be viewed with one hand (͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °)
▪ Relaxing, enjoyable music
▪ Great game / perfect girls!

short_description: A classic puzzle game designed to have fun. Open drawings by solving puzzles to relaxing music.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

content_descriptors.notes: This game contain content not appropriate for all ages: Nudity or Sexual Content.
